trans-unit.source: Red Hat login Email Verification
trans-unit.target: Red Hat 登入電子郵件驗證

trans-unit.source: Red Hat login Email Verification
trans-unit.target: Red Hat 登入電子郵件驗證

trans-unit.source: Your RHN Account is ready
trans-unit.target: 您的 RHN 帳號已經準備妥當

trans-unit.source: RHN User Created: {0} ({1}, {2} <{3}>)
RHN Account Deactivated: {0}
trans-unit.target: RHN 帳號停用：{0}

trans-unit.source:
The Red Hat login {0} has been deactivated in response to your request.
Thank you for contacting Red Hat.
trans-unit.target:
Red Hat 登入帳號 {0} 已經根據您的要求，予以停用。
謝謝您聯絡 Red Hat。

trans-unit.source: Red Hat login creation request
trans-unit.target: 建立 Red Hat 登入帳號的需求

trans-unit.source: For additional information in German language, please visit our Website: {0}
trans-unit.target: 欲知更多關於德文的詳細資料，請參閱我們的網站： {0}

trans-unit.source: For French, click here: {0}
trans-unit.target: 法文請按此：{0}

trans-unit.source:
Dear Red Hat Customer,
You were recently named on an order for new Red Hat subscriptions. These subscriptions are now available in the following account:
Customer Name : {0} Account Number: {1}
You can click on the link below to create a new Red Hat Login for this account and obtain access to your subscriptions:
{2}
If you are not the technical manager who will utilize the Red Hat subscription services purchased, please forward this email to the appropriate user within your organization. If they do not already have a Red Hat Login, that user may follow the link above to establish a new one.
If you already have a login and it is linked to the above account, then no action is required. You can find the account number linked to an existing Red Hat Login by logging into the following page:
http://www.redhat.com/support/
If you already have a Red Hat Login that is linked to a different account than the one listed on this email, and would like to use that account to manage these subscriptions, Red Hat can transfer them to your desired account. Please contact your regional Red Hat Customer Service Representative, using the contact information provided at the following link:
{3}
Note to the Account Administrator (Organization Administrator): Before a new user can access subscriptions, you must grant them the ability to see and manage the subscriptions on your account. This requires that a User Administration entitlement exist on your account. If required, please follow the link above and contact your regional Red Hat Customer Service Representative to request this feature.
Thank you for choosing Red Hat.
Sincerely, Red Hat Account Management Team
trans-unit.target:
Red Hat Network 用戶鈞鑒：
您最近訂購了 Red Hat 訂閱服務。這些訂閱服務可在以下帳號找到：
用戶名稱：{0} 帳號號碼：{1}
您可以點選以下連結，為這帳號建立新的 Red Hat 登入帳號，並存取您的 訂閱服務：
{2}
如果您不是使用 Red Hat 訂閱服務的技術人員， 請將這封電子郵件轉送給 公司裡的相關人員。如果他們還沒有 Red Hat 的登入帳號，請依循以上連 結，建立新的帳號。
如果您已經有登入帳號，同時該帳號連結到以上帳號，那麼您不需要採取任 何行動。您可以登入以下網頁，找到與現有 Red Hat 登入帳號相連結的帳 號號碼：
http://www.redhat.com/support/
如果您已經有了連結到另一個帳號的 Red Hat 登入帳號，而非本電子郵件 所列之，同時您又想使用這帳號來管理這些 訂閱服務，Red Hat 可以將這 些登入帳號轉移到您想要的帳號下。請使用以下網址所提供的聯絡資訊，聯 絡您所在區域的 Red Hat 客戶服務代表：
{3}
帳號管理員（組織管理員）請注意：在新 使用者可以存取訂閱服務之前，您 必須賦予他們使用您的帳號，檢視、管理訂閱服務的權利。您的帳號需要有 用戶管理權利。如果需要的話，請遵循以上連結的指示，聯絡您所在區域的 Red Hat 客戶服務代表，索求這項功能。
感謝您使用 Red Hat Network。
Red Hat 帳號管理小組敬上

trans-unit.source: Your Red Hat system is not able to receive service
trans-unit.target: 您的 Red Hat 系統無法收到服務

trans-unit.source:
Dear Red Hat Customer,
The following system has been associated with your Red Hat login and account in the past day, but could not be entitled to Red Hat Network services.
{0}
There are several reasons why this may have occurred:
1) You recently reinstalled a system and are attempting to associate the system with an existing, active subscription. Please ensure you delete your existing system profile on Red Hat Network by following the directions at https://rhn.redhat.com/help/faq/#26
2) The number of systems you have connected to Red Hat Network exceeds the number of active Red Hat subscriptions associated with your account. This may be because your subscriptions have expired or you need to purchase a Red Hat subscription.
To check the expiration dates of your existing Red Hat subscriptions, please visit:
https://www.redhat.com/apps/support/
Log in and click on View and manage your subscriptions link.
3) You recently installed a Red Hat product and your subscription number was not successfully activated. If you would like to try and activate your subscription again, please visit:
https://www.redhat.com/activate
For additional questions, please contact a Red Hat Customer Service representative at:
http://www.redhat.com/about/contact/directory.html#custservice
Thank you for using Red Hat Network.
trans-unit.target:
Red Hat 用戶鈞鑒：
過去幾天內，以下系統與您的 Red Hat 登入帳號有關聯，但無法從 Red Hat Network 處取得權利。
{0}
有幾項原因可能引起這問題：
1) 您最近重新安裝了系統，並試圖將這系統與現有、已啟動的訂閱服務相關連。請 確定您從 Red Hat Network 刪除現有的系統設定檔，方法請參閱 https://rhn.redhat.com/help/faq/#26
2) 您連接到 Red Hat Network 的系統數目超過了您帳號所擁有的 Red Hat 訂閱 數。這可能是因為您的訂閱服務已經過期，或您需要購買一份 Red Hat 訂閱服 務。
要檢查您現有 Red Hat 的訂閱資訊，請參閱：
https://www.redhat.com/apps/support/
登入後請按下「檢視」，並使用連結管理您的訂閱。
3) 您最近安裝了 Red Hat 產品，而您的訂閱碼並未成功地啟動。如果您打算試著 重新啟動您的訂閱，請使用以下網址：
https://www.redhat.com/activate
如果您有其他疑問，請聯絡 Red Hat 業務代表：
http://www.redhat.com/about/contact/directory.html#custservice
感謝您使用 Red Hat Network。

trans-unit.source: --------------------- Affected Systems List --------------------- This Errata Advisory may apply to the systems listed below. If you know that this errata does not apply to a system listed, it might be possible that the package profile for that server is out of date. In that case you should run 'up2date -p' (RHEL 4 and below) or 'rhn-profile-sync' (RHEL 5 and above) as root on the system in question to refresh your software profile.
trans-unit.target: --------------------- 受影響的系統清單 --------------------- 此勘誤建議能應用於下列所列出的系統。假如您知道 此勘誤無法應用於列出的系統，也許是因為 這個伺服器的套件設定檔已過期了。如真如此，您應在有問題的系統上 以root 身份執行「up2date -p」（RHEL4 以下）或「rhn-profile-sync」（RHEL 5 以上），以便更新您的軟體設定檔。

trans-unit.source: There is 1 affected system registered in 'Your RHN' (only systems for which you have explicitly enabled Errata Alerts are shown).
trans-unit.target: 有 1 個被影響的系統註冊於「您的 RHN」之中（只有您明確地 啟用勘誤警告的系統才會被顯示出）。

trans-unit.source: There are {0} affected systems registered in 'Your RHN' (only systems for which you have explicitly enabled Errata Alerts are shown).
trans-unit.target: 有 {0} 個被影響的系統註冊於「您的 RHN」之中（只有您明確地 啟用勘誤警告的系統才會被顯示出）。

trans-unit.source: RHN Daily Status Report for {0}
trans-unit.target: {0} 的 RHN 每日狀態報告

trans-unit.source:
Dear Red Hat Network User,
This email is sent to validate the email address that you have provided for your Red Hat login. Your Red Hat login, in combination with an active Red Hat subscription, provides you with access to systems management capabilities through Red Hat Network.
To ensure the security of the account information associated with your Red Hat login, please take a moment to click through the link below and verify that we have the correct email address. If you do not confirm your email address, your Red Hat login will eventually be deactivated.
Please note that this is a final notice. If you do not click through this URL within the next 2 days, your Red Hat login will deactivated.
To confirm your email address, please visit the following URL:
{0}
Thank you for using Red Hat Network. {1} {2}
trans-unit.target:
Red Hat Network 用戶鈞鑒：
這封電子郵件是用來驗證您為 Red Hat 登入帳號所提供的電子郵件位址。 您的 Red Hat 登入帳號結合了已啟用的 Red Hat 訂閱服務，能讓您透過 Red Hat Network，存取系統管理功能。
要確保您 Red Hat 登入帳號的資訊安全性，請撥冗點選以下連結，確認您 的電子郵件位址。如果無法確認您的電子郵件位址，那麼您的 Red Hat 登 入帳號將會被停用。
請注意這是最後通知。如果您不再兩天內點選以下網址，那麼您的 Red Hat 登入帳號將會被停用。
要確認您的電子郵件位址，請按下以下網址：
{0}
謝謝您使用 Red Hat Network。 {1} {2}

trans-unit.source: Red Hat Login Email Verification, Final Notice
trans-unit.target: Red Hat 登入電子郵件驗證，最後通知

trans-unit.source: Red Hat Satellite Server Certificate expiration warning
trans-unit.target: Red Hat 衛星伺服器認證過期的警告

trans-unit.source:
Dear Red Hat Network User,
This email is being sent to you to inform you that your RHN Satellite Certificate has expired on your local satellite {0}. After {1} day(s) the systems management services provided by your RHN Satellite Server will become inaccessible. Please contact your regional Red Hat Customer Service Representative for information on how to renew your Satellite Certificate.
Thank you for using Red Hat Network. --the Red Hat Network Team
trans-unit.target:
Red Hat Network 用戶鈞鑒：
我們藉此電子郵件通知您，您本地的 RHN 衛星伺服器 {0} 之認證已經過 期。經過 {1} 天之後，您 RHN 衛星伺服器所提供的系統管理服務將無法 繼續使用。請聯絡您的 Red Hat 客戶服務代表，了解更新衛星伺服器的 認證之方法。
謝謝您使用 Red Hat Network。
Red Hat Network 小組敬上

trans-unit.source: Red Hat satellite certificate expiration notice
trans-unit.target: Red Hat 衛星伺服器認證的過期通知

trans-unit.source:
Dear Red Hat Network User,
This email is being sent to you to inform you that your RHN Satellite Certificate has expired on your local satellite {0}. The system management services will be inaccessible until your certificate is renewed. Please contact your regional Red Hat Customer Service Representative for information on how to renew your Satellite Certificate.
Thank you for using Red Hat Network. --the Red Hat Network Team
trans-unit.target:
Red Hat Network 用戶鈞鑒：
我們藉此電子郵件通知您，您本地的 RHN 衛星伺服器 {0} 之認證已經過 期。除非您更新認證，否則您 RHN 衛星伺服器所提供的系統管理服務將無 法繼續使用。請聯絡您的 Red Hat 客戶服務代表，了解更新衛星伺服器 的認證之方法。
謝謝您使用 Red Hat Network。
Red Hat Network 小組敬上
